chinese: (某人的努力成果/人格)优秀的
meaning: (of a person or their work, efforts, or qualities) excellent or valuable
example: this organization does sterling work for youngsters.

chinese: 特别的/临时形成针对…的
meaning: formed, arranged, or done for a particular purpose only
example: an ad hoc committee (亚人委员会)

chinese: 指人/事物：神秘的，困惑的，难以理解的
meaning: a person or thing that is mysterious, puzzling, or difficult to understand.

chinese: 使之无效/使不能正常运作
meaning: render (something) ineffective or harmless by applying an opposite force or effect
example: impatience at his frailty began to neutralize her fear.

chinese: 善变的(贬义，指兴趣/忠诚变化无端)

example: an attack on the partiality of judges
